examples.example: 我国的西南地区有着独特的自然风光和丰富的民族文化。

translate.english: The southwestern region of our country has unique natural scenery and rich ethnic culture.

examples.example: 西南方向的天空中出现了一道美丽的彩虹。

translate.english: A beautiful rainbow appeared in the sky in the southwestern direction.

examples.example: 我一直向往去西南旅行，去领略那里别样的风土人情。

translate.english: I have always been longing to travel to the southwest to appreciate the unique local customs and practices there.
